EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Big Data Roadshow_Q116.01 Resend Invite_0216
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Big Data Workshop Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
26 February 2016 Suntec City Guild House 3 Temasek Boulevard (Tower 5) #02- 401/402 Suntec City Mall Singapore 038983 REGISTER <[[http://pivotal.io/event/big-data-workshop/singapore]]> Join Pivotal at the Big Data Workshop Join data technology experts from Pivotal to get the latest perspective on how big data analytics and applications are transforming organizations across industries.
This event provides an opportunity to learn about new developments in the rapidly-changing world of big data and understand best practices in building advanced analytics and data-driven applications.
Additionally, attendees will engage in hands-on data science and application development training using the market-leading Pivotal Big Data Suite. WHO SHOULD ATTEND In addition to addressing industry trends in big data, the sessions and hands-on workshop cover topics of interest to developers, architects, data scientists and technical managers. Register <[[http://pivotal.io/event/big-data-workshop/singapore]]> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:00 AM Check-In & Breakfast
9:00 AM - 9:50 AM The Journey to Becoming an Agile Data-Driven Enterprise
9:50 AM - 10:50 AM Advanced Analytics Demo and Modern Application Architecture Overview
10:50 AM - 11:10 AM Coffee Break
11:10 AM - 12:30 PM Question & Answer Session / Technical Workshop
12:30 PM - 13:30 PM Lunch VIEW FULL AGENDA <[[http://pivotal.io/event/big-data-workshop/singapore]]>
